title: Create FragmentInput component with inspiration flow
description:
Create the FO-05 fragment input component with the new inspiration-based UX.

Files to create:
- \ - New input component

Props interface:
\
State to track:
- \: boolean - whether inspiration section is visible
- \: boolean - whether expanded fragments are shown
- \: string | null - fragment clicked but not yet 'continued'
- \: boolean - whether user has typed (enables Continue button)

UI Flow (from spec):
1. **Initial State**: Input field with 'Start typing...' placeholder, 'Inspiration' link below
2. **After clicking Inspiration**: 5 fragment chips appear, 'More Inspiration' link below
3. **After clicking a fragment**: 
   - Fragment appended to input (with space if text exists)
   - 'Continue typing' button appears
   - All chips become inactive/dimmed
4. **After clicking 'Continue typing'**:
   - Cursor placed at end of input
   - Button disappears
   - Chips become active again
   - \ becomes true (enables Continue button)
5. **After clicking 'More Inspiration'**:
   - 8 more fragments appear
   - 'More Inspiration' link disappears

Chip styling:
- Multi-line with wrapped text (not single-line like FO-04)
- Use whitespace-normal for text wrapping
acceptance_criteria: app/fo-05/components/fragment-input.tsx exists; component renders input, Inspiration link, fragments, and Continue button; npm run build succeeds
closed_reason: Created FragmentInput component with inspiration flow: shows input with placeholder, Inspiration link reveals 5 chips, More Inspiration shows 8 more, fragment click appends to input and shows Continue typing button, chips use multi-line styling
